title: Griddled Halloumi with Vegetables
ingredients: ['2 courgettes, cut into long strips', '1 aubergine, halved lengthways and thinly sliced', '1 red pepper, cut into wide strips', '8 cherry tomatoes', '3 tbsp olive oil', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 tsp fresh thyme leaves', '250g halloumi cheese', '250g couscous', '400ml boiling vegetable stock, made with a stock cube']
